lumis.portal.serialization

Class SerializationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.serialization.SerializationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISerializationManager

    public class SerializationManager
extends Object
implements ISerializationManager
    Implements the serialization and deseralization of a channel tree.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 16272 $ $Date: 2014-04-15 14:32:51 -0300 (Tue, 15 Apr 2014) $
